pages.title: Dirt to Path
pages.text: You can now create $(item)Grass Path$() from $(item)Dirt$(). Further right clicking with a $(item)Hoe$() produces $(item)Shallow Dirt$(), which can be waterlogged.$(br2)Paths are also available for more soil blocks, such as $(item)Podzol$(), $(item)Mycelium$(), and $(item)Nether Nylium$().
